QuestData.Title: In Sprite Of Everything
QuestData.Description: The sprites of Shan'ze Dao have always been capricious tricksters, but now they have fallen under the mogu's influence.$B$BEven as we speak, they gather under a new leader.$B$BWe cannot allow this to happen.$B$BTheir mischievous pranks were one thing, but united, their dark magic is too powerful and too dangerous to comprehend.$B$BTake out their leader before it is too late.
